trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un set ordinato di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection stores references to items that will be embedded in an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Il EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection memorizza i riferimenti agli elementi che verranno incorporati in un messaggio di posta elettronica.

trans-unit.source: The embedded items can be image files such as company logos.
trans-unit.target: Elementi incorporati possono essere file di immagine, ad esempio il logo della società.

trans-unit.source: The EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.EmbeddedObjects%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: Viene utilizzato il EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.EmbeddedObjects%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.EmbeddedObjects%2A>

trans-unit.source: E-mail messages that allow embedded objects are configurable in the following Web controls by setting their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> properties declaratively: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> > [!NOTE] > The values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> and EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection objects are not stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Messaggi di posta elettronica che supportano gli oggetti incorporati possono essere configurati nei seguenti controlli Web impostando i relativi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>proprietà in modo dichiarativo:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>> [!NOTE] > i valori di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject>ed EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection oggetti non sono archiviati in stato di visualizzazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: This protects against malicious users discovering path information for your server.
trans-unit.target: Ciò consente di proteggere gli utenti malintenzionati di individuazione delle informazioni sul percorso per il server.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref> alla fine del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'indice del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is .
trans-unit.target: The specified value is .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> contains a specific <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref> contiene una specifica <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to identify the position of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection.IndexOf%2A>metodo per identificare la posizione <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref> per individuare il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: if the contains obj; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if the contains obj; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> instance beginning at the specified index in the array.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli oggetti della raccolta in una matrice unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>istanza a partire dall'indice specificato della matrice.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> is the destination of the elements copied from the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>è la destinazione degli elementi copiata dall'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: La matrice deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero `array` da cui avviare la copia.

trans-unit.source: The specified array is .
trans-unit.target: The specified array is .

trans-unit.source: The specified index is out of range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Specificato index non compreso nell'intervallo della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specific <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina l'indice di uno specifico <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> if it exists in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref> se è presente nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> object at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza della posizione di indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: If `index` is 0, `value` is added to the beginning of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Se `index` è 0, `value` viene aggiunto all'inizio di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>

trans-unit.source: If `index` equals the number of items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>, `value` is appended to the end.
trans-unit.target: Se `index` è uguale al numero di elementi di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>, `value` viene aggiunto alla fine.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>

trans-unit.source: An integer value that indicates the index position at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che indica la posizione di indice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref> nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> object to insert into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref> oggetto da inserire nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is out of range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Specificato index non compreso nell'intervallo della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is .
trans-unit.target: The specified value is .

trans-unit.source: Returns a specific element of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>, identified by its position.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un elemento specifico di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>, identificato in base alla posizione.

trans-unit.source: If `index` does not match an existing member of the collection, an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se `index` non corrisponde a un membro esistente della raccolta, si verifica un errore.

trans-unit.source: The Item property is the default property for a collection.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà dell'elemento è la proprietà predefinita per una raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent: ```vb# myObject = myCollection(index) myObject = myCollection.Item(index) ``` ```c# myObject = myCollection[index]; myObject = myCollection.Item[index]; ```
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, le righe di codice seguenti sono equivalenti:```vb# myObject = myCollection(index) myObject = myCollection.Item(index) ``` ```c# myObject = myCollection[index]; myObject = myCollection.Item[index]; ```

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero dell'elemento da ottenere.

trans-unit.source: Returns the at the location specified by the index parameter.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il nel percorso specificato per il index parametro.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index è minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is equal to or greater than the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - index è uguale o maggiore del numero di elementi nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la prima occorrenza dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref> dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Remove method uses the information contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> to identify the item to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Remove utilizza le informazioni contenute nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject>per identificare l'elemento da rimuovere dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref> per rimuovere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>.
